availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William F. Whitfield (Hopkins County, KY, farm laborer.)

body.p: Person County, North Carolina, and Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Son of Richard M. Whitfield and Susannah Whitfield. Married to Elizabeth Whitfield. Father of Rosa Whitfield, Preston L. Whitfield, John Whitfield, Sarah Whitfield, and William Whtifield. Farmhand in Person County, North Carolina, in 1850. Farm laborer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, North Carolina, Person County, p. 428A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 652-53.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Fisher Spring, p. 114B.
